text: Moses todi obrani simdesyat lyudy z chysla yoho lyudey, shchob prybuty do nashoyi pryznachenoyi audytoriyi. Koly tremtinnya trusylo yikh, vin skazav, "Miy Lord, Vy mohly vynyshchyly yikh ranishe, razom z meni, yakshcho Vy tak willed. Chy Ne mohly b vy vynyshchyty nas dlya sprav tsykh sered nas shcho durni? Tse povynno yavlyaty soboyu test shcho Vy zaprovadyly dlya nas. Z tse, Vy zasudzhuyete whomever Vy budete, ta dovidnyk whomever Vy budete. Vy ye nash Lord ta Mayster, tak probachayete nam, nam zlyvy z Vashym myloserdyam; Vy yavlyayete soboyu krashchyy Forgiver
